# shouldPrintBackgrounds

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to include any background color or graphics when printing content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shouldPrintBackgrounds: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value for this preference is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Setting Rendering Preferences

- **minimumFontSize**: The minimum font size, in points.

items.description: The minimum font size, in points.
